title: Honor Levels
body: I am honor level 4 and I don't have honor capsules.Can someone explain me how to get them?

replies.body: Honor capsules aren't necessarily a guaranteed drop for being any specific Honor Rank. Also, I've received word that once you've gotten all 12 key fragments for the month you won't be getting any additional drops until those fragments reset. Riot devs are working on updating the [**Honor FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148), and you'll be able to find all the details there once it's finished.

I have the same issue. I am honor level 4 but  havent received any capsules and since 1 week i only get 1 key fragment in 2-3 days. Usually i got 2-3 fragments a day. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
Did they change the amount of fragments you get?
You people need to stop complaining. I'm honor 1 right now and have less rewards. And here you guys are whining about not getting capsules? Unreasonable
